description:
A nice alternative to DEET-based repellents, the formula contains 20% Icaridin, making it a good choice for children from 6 months to 12 years.

  • Active ingredient is Icaridin 20%, with 0% DEET
  • Formula is non-irritating, non-greasy and non-allergenic
  • Provides 12-hour protection from ticks, 12-hour protection from mosquitoes, and 10 hours from black flies
  • Suited to kids from 6 months and up
  • Bottle design includes a compass, whistle and carabiner loop
name: PiActive DEET FREE Regular Size Insect Repellent Pump Spray 175ml
